price: (Sulayimani) aravuga ati “Turareba niba uvugisha ukuri cyangwa niba uri umwe mu banyabinyoma!”
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
